name: Spherical Delight
description:
Move with arrow keys or WASD!

Once you start moving in a level, don't stop!

Survive a few seconds in a level to move onto the next!

Made by Noa Calice (Blackthornprod) for the 4 game developers jam of the same art kit, hosted by game developer and youtuber Miziziziz!
Link to series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLmugv6_kd0qMgc7Bd2gO7cbfrdBIQrdpV
